results.name: a(n) is the (3n+2)-th component of the continued fraction for sum(k>=0,2^(-k!)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
program: (Scheme) (define (A092910 n) (- 5 (* 1/2 (A007400 (+ 2 n))))) ;;  Code for A007400 given under that entry. - _Antti Karttunen_, Aug 12 2017
